node.display_long_description:
PokerStars, the world’s leading poker brand, has combined live and online poker in a truly immersive VR experience.

-Study your opponents, pick up on their tells, and chat in real time
-Handle your chips and cards, just as you would at a real-world poker table
-Keep the table fun with interactive props and toys, summoned in an instant

This is the most exciting poker game on the planet, and there’s a seat open for you right now.

- Key Features -

-Authentic poker, blackjack & slots action
-A fully immersive, social experience
-Simple, intuitive, easy to play
-Play real opponents
-Realistic physics, from cards and chips to balloons, pistols and more
-Unlock free chips every day
-Certified RNG

- Exotic locales -

-Medieval Castle
-Cyber Apartment
-Evil Volcano Lair
-Macau 2050
-The Galaxy Space Station
-Macau Suite
-The Showdown Saloon
-The Monte-Carlo Yacht
-The Void

nodes.title: High Stakes Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players we have a great update for you with [Patch 63] now live for download!

This update features 2 new awesome packs The St. Patrick's Day Pack & The March Mania 2021 Pack! It also includes new high stakes cash game stakes and a new $25M Metallic Ruby Chip!

New Features
- New cash game stakes and leader board
- New $25M Metallic Ruby chip
- New featured game section in games browser
- New price points available for higher purchases

Bug Fixes / Improvements
- Storm Goddess Ring can Ignite Smokeables
- 100k/200k & 500k/1M Stakes are now highlighted in the server browser and will always appear at the top of the first page (if more than 5 entries like this exist it will continue onto the next page)
- SG Info Panel contains info on how Multipliers are used for payouts
- Storm Goddess Skin Fix
- Server browser filters refresh
- Storm Goddess Lower Load Time for animations on Quest
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Join us on Discord

nodes.title: The Big Game Update!
nodes.body_text:
Hey PokerStars VR players we have a new update for you with [Patch 59] now live for download!

This update includes a new sports betting feature on The Big Game this weekend and a brand new Big Game player pack available for purchase.

New Features
- Sports Betting Panel
- Added avatar animation & lipsync to tutorial
- New Fetch Room List for improved game list loading in the lobby
- The Big Game Player Pack

Bug Fixes
- Cards sometimes jumping and auto-folding on Seat 2 in Cyber and Medieval fixed
- Some instances of players seeing grey-cards should be fixed (all saved card skin selections had to be reset)
- Some issues with spin wheel in lobby breaking should be fixed
- Cigar hovering above table fix
- Various spamming error fixes

Join us on Discord

node.reviewDescription: I have some fellow Oculus Quest users that would like to meet up with me in Pokerstars.  Unfortunately, we have been unable to do that without using a telephone and choosing a table.  I can't see my friends in the lobby and inviting them to a table doesn't seem to work.  Perhaps this is something that I am doing wrong, but it shouldn't be this hard.
node.reviewTitle: Can't easily meet up with friends

website_page_meta.description: Step into the future with this game-changing release from the biggest name in the business. Visually stunning environments; realistic chip and card movements; an endless supply of interactive toys, props and accessories; and the world’s best poker software powering multiplayer Texas Hold’em action.
website_page_meta.title: PokerStars VR · Oculus Quest
